title: DATS biological entity schema
description: A biological entity is a recognized entity covering biological process, molecular functions or cellular components (from: http://geneontology.org/).

identifierInfo.description: Primary identifiers for the biological entity.

alternateIdentifierInfo.description: Alternate identifiers for the biological entity.

relatedIdentifierInfo.description: Related identifiers for the biological entity.

name.description: The name of the biological entity (ideally specified from a controlled vocabulary/ontology).
